WordPress Management and Design Credential




The WordPress Management and Design series of courses is the first WordPress Credential education program in the world. Individuals who have completed all three (Level 1, Level 2, and Level 3) courses have mastered front end development. They have a unique understanding of Internet business, data networking and website design.




WordPress Management and Design Credential holders have validated their understanding of important aspects of WordPress and its websites. This credential is designed for anyone who wants to work in the WordPress space or learn to build WordPress websites. Once certified, these individuals are ready to pursue WordPress web design, e-commerce, JavaScript, databases and other fields.

Average Salary- $66,540 per Year
The 2023 annual mean salary of a WordPress front end developer is $66,540 USD. This salary was calculated based on the 14,000+ IT professionals who responded to the 2016 IT Skills and Salary survey that was conducted by Global Knowledge in September of 2015.

Prerequisites 
No prior experience using the Internet, developing web pages or configuring networks needed.

Exam Requirements and Recertification
To meet the credentialing requirements CertifyWP advisory board has determined that credential holders must re-take the credentialing exam every 3 years to maintain their credentialing. If there are any new developments or software changes to WordPress, our advisory Board will make the corrections and the exam will reflect the changes. 
Along with exam questions a practical exam is required to receive the WordPress Management and Design Credential. This practical exam shows that each credential holder not only has a firm understanding of the needed technical skills but can also execute the skills. 
The Exam will be proctored by CertifyWP approved education bodies. This is to ensure everyone receives the same exam experience. CertifyWP maintains an equal opportunity for everyone who wishes to take the exams.

Frequently Asked Questions
If you have any
Help Center



Do I have to be a member of CertifyWP to obtain the WordPress Management and Design Credential? 
No, anyone can take the credentialing exam with or without the membership. 

Do I have to take the course through CertifyWP to take the exam and obtain my WordPress Management and Design Credential? 
No, you do not have to take our course to be eligible to take the exam and receive the credential.  

Are the exams proctored? 
Yes, to maintain a fair and equal exam, every exam will have a CertifyWP approved proctor. To apply to be a proctor, please reach out to CertifyWP

Why is there a practical exam? 
The practical exam tests your ability to demonstrate that you not only know the technical knowledge in the exam questions, but that you can also execute the skills needed.  

Do I have to take all of the exam at one time? 
No, you can take the exam in 3 parts or as one cumulative exam. If you take the exam as a cumulative or in 3 parts the exam content is the same. To receive the credential, you also must complete practical exam as well. 

How long will it take to receive the test results from my practical exam? 
on average you will receive your test results in 7-10 business days. 

I do not agree with my exam results, what can I do? 
You may appeal your exam results by filling out the appeals form. For more information about appeals process, refer to the appeals page. 

What is the appeal process? 
The advisory board will meet and discuss the appeals form and make a determination based off of the documentation from the test results and the appeals form. For more information visit the Exam Review and Appeal page. 

If I become a member, do I get a discount on the exam? 
No, the credentialing exam is a separate cost and cannot be discounted. 

Do I get a discount on the exam if I purchase the education course? 
No, the credentialing exam is a separate cost and cannot be discounted. 

Does Taking the CertifyWP course increase my chances of passing the exam?
CertifiyWP does not imply that taking our training will make it easier for the candate to pass the exam.

Do I get a discount for buying the course and the exam? 
No, bundles are not offered for the course and the exam. Each must be purchased separately.
